description: A collection of circles in a triangular formation atop a long trapezoidal formation; there is also a very thin rectangular formation of circles extending outwards from the center of the right side of the triangular formation. Each circle has a different number in the center denoting how many lines stem from that point. There is a dark blue triangle in the top right corner of the trapezoidal formation and a light blue triangle in the center.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
